title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD stays volatile within range, setting off the Fed week
summary: Gold is moving back and forth in a familiar range around the $3,650 barrier, kicking off a big central bank week early Monday.

title: Gold Weekly Forecast: Fed policy decisions to trigger next big action in XAU/USD
summary: Gold (XAU/USD) touched a new record-high above $3,670 before entering a consolidation phase. The Federal Reserveâ€™s (Fed) policy decisions could allow investors to decide whether XAU/USD has more room on the upside, despite technically overbought conditions.

title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD attempts another run toward record highs, will it succeed?
summary: Gold is reversing the previous decline to retest the $3,650 barrier early Friday.

title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD holds ground as investors await fresh clues
summary: Gold price held within familiar levels on Thursday, hovering around $3,630 in the mid-American session. The XAU/USD pair suffered a minor intraday setback ahead of first-tier events, which were unable to spur action around the bright metal.
